entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 12 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature rising to minus 12 by morning. Wind chill minus 29 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 10. Wind chill near minus 20. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature rising to minus 6 by morning.
